meanings.sent1: The pure snow was untinged by any dirt or debris.
meanings.sent2: The blank canvas remained untinged by any paint.
meanings.sent3: The untinged sky was a perfect backdrop for the colorful fireworks.
meanings.sent4: Her untinged innocence shone through in her honest eyes.
meanings.sent5: The untinged water in the crystal-clear lake reflected the blue sky perfectly.

meanings.definition: Not affected or influenced by something harmful or negative
meanings.sent1: His decision remained untinged by any external pressure.
meanings.sent2: Her kindness was untinged by any hint of insincerity.
meanings.sent3: The untinged laughter of the children filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: His untinged optimism was a beacon of hope for those around him.
meanings.sent5: The untinged love in her heart radiated warmth to all who knew her.
